html: Heartbroken to hear about the shooting at Chabad of Poway. We cannot be silent about anti-Semitism in this country. We must stand up and speak out against it – always. And we cannot be silent about the need for real gun reform. Praying for the victims and their families tonight.
text:
Heartbroken to hear about the shooting at Chabad of Poway. We cannot be silent about anti-Semitism in this country. We must stand up and speak out against it – always. And we cannot be silent about the need for real gun reform.

Praying for the victims and their families tonight.

text: We’re at Station #1 where we met with families who were transported from the PDN Bridge. Today, the House passed the Veterans’ Access to Child Care Act, which would make the program permanent & expand it nationwide!

This bill will ensure that no veteran ever has to choose between medical treatment and child care.

I look forward to seeing it signed into law soon!

html: During tonight's #SOTU we heard more fear-mongering, more divisive rhetoric and more partisan posturing, with a few empty words about unity. And we heard nothing about climate change or gun violence. This is no different than the past two years, and it's not going to cut it.
text:
During tonight's #SOTU we heard more fear-mongering, more divisive rhetoric and more partisan posturing, with a few empty words about unity. 

And we heard nothing about climate change or gun violence.

This is no different than the past two years, and it's not going to cut it.

html: The President talks about a major mass shooting, in Pittsburgh, but is silent about the problem of gun violence which claimed 40,000+ American lives in 2017. Tomorrow @HouseDemocrats will hold the first House hearings on gun violence in almost a decade. #SOTU No more silence.
text:
The President talks about a major mass shooting, in Pittsburgh, but is silent about the problem of gun violence which claimed 40,000+ American lives in 2017.

Tomorrow @HouseDemocrats will hold the first House hearings on gun violence in almost a decade. #SOTU

No more silence.
